document_data.caption: A map showing the Horsefields in northwestern Evermeet.
document_data.name: Horsefields
document_data.mainbody: The '''Horsefields''' was a beautiful glade located on the [[elven]] homeland of [[Evermeet]].
document_data.Geography: The Horsefields was located in eastern Evermeet east of the [[River Ardulith]] and the [[Eagle Hills]]. Some of the glade bordered the [[Trackless Sea]] near [[Taltempla]].
document_data.Inhabitants: The glade got its name from the herds of mystical [[moon-horse]]s that lived within.
